product_name: Primal Wear Amethyst Bike Jersey - Women's - 2013 Overstock
long_description: Perfect for club rides, long tours, mountain biking and commuting, the women's Primal Wear Amethyst Bike Jersey has a relaxed fit and quick-drying fabric that keeps you comfy mile after mile. Double-knit polyester fabric pulls sweat off the skin and dries fast, helping keep you cool and dry as you pedal. UPF 35 sun protection. Full front zipper and elastic-free arms and hem enhance airflow. Dropped hem in back extends coverage. Primal Wear Amethyst Bike Jersey for women has 3 rear pockets. Overstock.
short_description: Perfect for club rides, long tours, mountain biking and commuting, the women's Primal Wear Amethyst Bike Jersey has a relaxed fit and quick-drying fabric that keeps you comfy mile after mile.
